MessageDB.Message: Hold Down and to the right on the Throttle stick for two seconds to begin the arming process
Flight aborted due to error status
Calibrating the gyroscope. This lasts for two seconds. Keep the quadcopter as still as possible.
* Hold down and to the left on the throttle stick to disarm
This is a test of a robot transmitted string
HMC5883L Compass sensor failed contact or reported bad status
No response or incorrect WHO_AM_I response from the MPU
Quadcopter battery critically low quadcopter battery level fell below the low battery warning voltage
LPS25H Barometer returned a bad status
No previously configured flight parameters detected, resetting to defaults
Couldn't load a valid Accelerometer and Magnetometer tune from EEPROM
